thread.title: 7000 visitors at Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Museum
thread.title_full: 7000 visitors at Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Museum | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: 7000 visitors at Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Museum
text:
(MENAFN Press) Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Museum attracted more than seven thousands guests varying between residents, locals and the Gulf Regions during the Adha Eid holidays, achieving a new record. This high turnover was achieved by organizing a full program of family activities and distinctive even, in addition to organizing 6 workshops for children to satisfy their desires through fun-filled activities.
During Eid al-Adha holiday the families visited the museum and enjoyed a special tour accompanied by experienced tour guides around the collections, and have seen the wonderful and diverse exhibits. Furthermore the workshops and activities such as the LEGO" & colors, Painting, Calligraphy, Clay Sculpture and Drawing witnessed a huge participation from the guests as it was entirely booked in advance by families where they spent a quality time with their kids in exercising their favorites hobbies. 
Visitors were able to capture those moments by taking many of the souvenir pictures in the photography studio that has been outfitted for them during the Eid al-Adha to enable them to obtain personal memorabilia.
The museum's recently established outlets such as the coffee shop, which offers snacks and drinks, and the new educational area which witnessed a distinctive participation by the families, moreover the souvenir shop which displays a selection of locally manufactured products to reflect the originality of both the Qatari and Arabic cultures. 

About Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Museum
